description: Nonnegative numbers of the form x^y - y^x, for x,y > 1.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
maple: N:= 10^8: # to get all terms <= NA:= (0,1):for x from 2 while x^(x+1) - (x+1)^x <= N do   for y from x+1 do      z:= x^y - y^x;      if z > N then break      elif z > 0 then A:=A,z;      fiod od:{A}; # _Robert Israel_, Aug 20 2014
mathematica: Union[Flatten[Table[If[a^b-b^a>-1&&a^b-b^a<10^6*2,a^b-b^a],{a,1,123},{b,a,144}]]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Apr 26 2008 *)nn=10^50; n=1; Union[Reap[While[n++; k=n+1; num=Abs[n^k-k^n]; num<nn, Sow[num]; While[k++; num=n^k-k^n; num<nn, Sow[num]]]][[2,1]]]
author: _Erich Friedman_
